DocumentationDefinitionList.Title: Solr: Default index fields (incomplete)
DocumentationDefinitionList.Heading: List of further interesting index fields

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The unique identifier of the document in the Solr index since OpenCms 11. Unless you use serial dates, it is idential to the id field.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Structure id used as a unique identifier for a document (The structure id of the resource).

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Full root path (The root path of the resource, e.g., /sites/default/flower_en/.content/article.html)

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Parent folders (multi-valued field containing an entry for each parent path as root path).

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Existing locale nodes for XML content and all available locales in the case of binary files.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The creation date (The date when the resource itself has being created).

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The date last modified (The last modification date of the resource itself).

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: A general content field that holds all extracted resource data (all languages, type text_general).

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Extracted textual content optimized for the language specific search (Default languages: en, de, el, es, fr, hu, it). This is typically a field to search in and to highlight on.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Holds only an excerpt of the content, i.e., the first part of the localized content field. This can be useful if you print excerpts of contents and not use highlighting.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: All categories as exact strings for faceting purposes.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: All searched propertiesMeans set at the resource or a folder the resource is located in. of a resource as searchable and stored text (field name: <Property_Definition_Name>_prop as text_general).

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: All properties directly set at a resource as searchable and stored text (field name: <Property_Definition_Name>_prop as text_general).
